entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times mixed with snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
